title: I didnt recieve my bonus RP and accidently bought a rune book and i cant refund it. :(
body: I brought some RP on the day the Extra RP thing came out but did not recieve the extra, although it was by phone credit so idk if it does phone credit.

replies.body: It should, Riot made an announcement saying that all people who missed out on the bonus RP shall be getting it soon.
